message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $20,000.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product but $20,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider a price closer to $10,000?

I understand that $20,000 is a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $16,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me a bit in the middle. However,  $16,000 is still a stretch for me. Could you consider $12,000? I feel that's a fair price.

I can see that we're getting closer, Bob. However, $12,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to compromise and meet you at $14,000. This is my final offer, and I'm confident it's a fair price for both of us.
Alice, I understand this is your final offer. I'm willing to make one last push at $13,000. If that doesn't work, I'll have to consider my other options.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $14,000, Bob. I'm starting to think that $13,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to give you one last chance to meet me at $14,000, but if not, I'll have to consider other options.
